questions.question_text:
Universal Container's app builder needs to display an account's rating on all contacts related to that account.
Which formula is valid in a text formula field on the contact to display the appropriate value? (Choose two.)

choices.B: A lookup relationship field on the child object.
choices.D: A master-detail relationship field on the child object.
choices.C: A master-detail relationship field on the parent object.
choices.A: A lookup relationship field on the parent object.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

D - The detail record must be related to the master through a master-detail relationship.
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.fields_about_roll_up_summary_fields.htm&type=5
The master-detail relationship field need to be created on the child object. This allows each child to be linked to the parent object.

What type of field must exist before the roll-up summary can be created, and where should it be located?
Which of these statements is true for Lightning Connect?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D - All of the above.
"Lightning Connect maps Salesforce external objects to data tables in external systems. Instead of copying the data into your organization, Lightning Connect accesses the data on demand and in real time. The data is never stale, and we access only what you need. We recommend that you use Lightning Connect when:
You have a large amount of data that you don’t want to copy into your Salesforce organization.
You need small amounts of data at any one time.
You want real-time access to the latest data."
